item.description:
On August 8, 2006, the CCRI Roleplayer's Guild is going to host the weekly Dungeons and Dragons campaign day, beginning at 12 noon and ending at 6-7PM. Last event, the group took a vote, and unanimously decided to end the Red Hand of Doom series and go into a custom campaign in an original world- the World of Vale.

You can bring a 6th or 7th level character, using resources from the following rulebooks:

All 3.5 Core Rulebooks
Players Handbook 2
Dungeon Masters Guide 2
Forgotten Realms Campaign Setting
Magic of Faerun
Silver Marches
Spell Compendium
Eberron Campaign Setting
Sharn: The City of Towers
Races of Eberron
Complete Warrior
Complete Divine
Complete Arcane
Complete Adventurer
Heroes of Battle
Expanded Psionics Handbook (experimental)
Unearthed Arcana (check with me first, no gestalt, no major bloodlines)

If you want to play a unique or rare race, make sure to contact me beforehand. Otherwise, only things from the above books can be used. NO EXCEPTIONS!

Parking is normally found in the student lot, to the left of the main building. There is a guest parking area, but it's limited to 30 minutes only. RIPTA serves CCRI Warwick on the 22 and 30 routes from Kennedy Plaza in Providence.

http://ripta.com/sche...
http://ripta.com/sche...

The event is on the first floor, in room 1128. A map of the campus can be found at http://www.ccri.edu/f...
item.name: CCRI Roleplayer's Guild DnD Game- Custom Campaigning
